mapper.select: SELECT r.routine_id AS routineId, r.name AS routineName, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re WHERE re.routine_id = r.routine_id ) AS exerciseCount FROM fitfusion_routine r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_date DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

select r.routine_id as routineId, r.name as routineName, r.difficulty_level as difficulty, ( select e.category from fitfusion_routine_exercise re2 join fitfusion_exercises e on re2.exercise_id = e.exercise_id where re2.routine_id = r.routine_id fetch first 1 row only ) as targetPart, ( select listagg(e.name, ', ') within group (order by e.name) from fitfusion_routine_exercise re3 join fitfusion_exercises e on re3.exercise_id = e.exercise_id where re3.routine_id = r.routine_id ) as summary, ( select (sum(re4.sets) * 5) || 'ë¶„' from fitfusion_routine_exercise re4 where re4.routine_id = r.routine_id ) as totalTime, ( select count(*) from fitfusion_routine_exercise re3 where re3.routine_id = r.routine_id ) as exerciseCount from fitfusion_routine r where r.user_id = #{userId} order by r.created_date desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{size} rows only
mapper.delete: delete from fitfusion_routine where user_id = #{userId} and routine_id = #{routineId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.description AS description, r.name AS routineName, ( SELECT e.category FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re2 JOIN fitfusion_exercises e ON re2.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE re2.routine_id = r.routine_id FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS targetPart, ( SELECT sum(re.sets) * 5 FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re WHERE re.routine_id = r.routine_id ) AS totalTime, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re3 WHERE re3.routine_id = r.routine_id ) AS totalExercises, ( SELECT sets FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re4 WHERE re4.routine_id = r.routine_id FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS defaultSet FROM fitfusion_routine r WHERE r.routine_id = #{routineId} and r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT e.exercise_id AS exerciseId, re.routine_exercise_id AS routineExerciseId, e.name AS name, e.category AS category, e.main_parts AS parts, e.equipment AS equipment, e.fatigue_level AS fatigueLevel, re.sets AS sets, re.reps AS reps, re.weight AS weight, e.description AS description FROM fitfusion_routine_exercise re , fitfusion_exercises e , fitfusion_routine r WHERE re.routine_id = #{routineId} AND r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.routine_id = re.routine_id AND re.exercise_id = e.exercise_id ORDER BY re.routine_exercise_id
